# RoomName (component)

The RoomName component renders the name of the connected LiveKit room inside a span tag.

## Import

```typescript
import { RoomName } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
<LiveKitRoom>
  <RoomName />
</LiveKitRoom>
```

{% partial file="p_usage.md" /%}

## Properties

| Property                                                       | Type                | Description  |
| -------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ------------ |
| [childrenPosition?](./react/roomnameprops.childrenposition.md) | 'before' \| 'after' | _(Optional)_ |
